data.name: Dirty Education / 肉的教育
data.detailed_description:
Gay. Furry. Adult. Dating Simulator.

Kenny is a young tiger going to college. Ever since puberty, it had been very difficult for him to control his urges and focus on his studies. Luckily for him, the college he is attending is experimenting on a new method of education: capitalizing on the surging testosterone in its all-male and all-legal students, sexual favors are rewarded to those who do well in exams. If you cannot fight it, why not make use of it?

The game is part dating sim and part puzzle solving. Solving more of the randomly generated puzzles allows the player to advance further in the story, and get more steamy rewards. Each subject of affection requires a different combination of puzzle completion. There are 7 love interest currently in the game, hundreds of revealing or nude images of hyper-masculine furry males, and hundreds of steamy animations during adult scenes. Aside from the 7 endings from the love interests, there are 3 bonus endings too. Best news is, with your support, the game can be continuously updated with more characters, more stories, more dialogues, and more functions!
